    C

    calculateValue() - Method in class model.Hand
    Calculates and returns the total value of the cards in the hand.
    Card - Record Class in model
    Represents a card in the Blackjack game.
    Card(Suit, Rank) - Constructor for record class model.Card
    Creates an instance of a Card record class.
    CARD_HEIGHT - Static variable in record class model.Card
    The height of the card (in pixels).
    CARD_WIDTH - Static variable in record class model.Card
    The width of the card (in pixels).
    cardsLeft() - Method in class model.Deck
    Returns the number of cards left in the deck.
    checkPlayerBusts() - Method in class controller.Game
    Checks if the player has bust (hand value exceeds 21).
    checkWins() - Method in class controller.Game
    Checks the winner of the game based on the value of the dealer's and player's hands.
